### Themes and prompting questions:

Theme 1:  Reflect on what you have accomplished, and what you still must accomplish to reach your summer goals.

Theme 2:  Reflect on what you have learned about yourself as a scholar and writer through participating in this summer research experience.

Theme 3:  Reflect on how the support of your mentors and peers has influenced your summer research experience.

Please write a response to each theme. Response should be a minimum of 600 words. Feel free to expand as much as you want.
